Increases the Elemental Burst Level of all party members by 1.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

name: Judgment
description: When an opponent is defeated, it will release a shockwave that deals AoE True DMG to other opponents.

name: Keen Edge
description: All party members receive a 30% Physical DMG Bonus.

name: Burst Damage
description: Elemental Burst DMG dealt by all party members increased by 30%.

name: Overmastered
description: All characters in the party have their Elemental Mastery increased by 100.

name: Iron Wall
description: All party members' Shield Strength increased by 40%.

name: Song of Steel
description: All party members' Normal Attack DMG increased by 30%.

name: Fierce Strike
description: All party members' Charged Attack DMG increased by 30%.

name: Dance of Abundance
description: After using an Elemental Burst, the Elemental Profusion effect will occur, increasing all party members' Elemental Burst DMG by 12% for 15s. Max 5 stacks. When 5 stacks are possessed, Normal ATK SPD is increased by 15%.

name: Conductivity
description: When an active character triggers Electro-Charged, all of that player's party members' Elemental Burst CDs are decreased by 1s. This can occur once every 1.5s.

name: Wilderness Rod
description: A rather pedestrian-looking wooden fishing rod. Apart from being quite sturdy, even to point where you could use it for self-defense, it lacks any sort of special features. But the old adage holds true — "the novice's rod shall be the tent-pole of their veterancy." Even the greatest of anglers must surely have started with this simple implement.

name: Windtangler
description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Mondstadt.

A long, bright, transparent rod created by a poet from Mondstadt. To help borrow the power of Anemo to help raise the rod, the poet rather ingeniously designed a fishing reel made from the leaves of Windwheel Asters, which also imparts a certain romanticism of "lingering in the wind" to this device. But perhaps there were issues in the handiwork or in the design itself, for the finalized product could not spin as freely as expected. Perhaps this is what they call "the chasm between professions?"

name: Wishmaker
description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Liyue.

A long rod that stands like elegant bamboo. It is said to have been constructed and kept by a skilled hermit from Liyue, and it was first discovered on a stone tablet with the following words carved upon it: "O you who aspire, take up this rod," like a legendary sword waiting for a hero to pull it out. Of course, you only ever hear this glorious origin story from the mouths of merchants, so it may just be some rhetoric used to increase the item's value... But those who know this and still use this rod can only be those who are ready and willing to accept this pact.

name: Narukawa Ukai
description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Inazuma.

A rod created to commemorate the ancient Ukai, or Cormorant, fishing method. The ruby-red gem at the tip of the rod represents the tinder used by the cormorant fishers, and the bird ornaments along the rod's shaft represent the cormorants themselves, who helped the hard-working Inazumans pass through those cataclysmic years. This low-efficiency fishing method has long become obsolete, but the persevering, pioneering spirit has been passed down together with this rod.

name: Moonstringer
description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle at an accelerating rate and increase your chances of success. If you leave the Ideal Tension Zone, the acceleration will reset.
A special fishing rod created for the sake of the Lunar Leviathan. To tackle this legendary fish, the creator of this rod specially added some material with rare functions onto the rod itself and the fishing line, giving it both great malleability and tensile strength. Of course, such a treasure could easily catch ordinary fish, but that seems like overkill to the point where even the rod might feel ashamed to be used thus.

name: Serendipity
description:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Sumeru.

This archaic Sumeru fishing rod is carved like white jade, decorated with dark gold patterns, and embellished with green gems. Under its pure aesthetics, it seems to have some meaning related to "life" — it is said that the oldest fishing rod of Sumeru was a branch wrapped with vines, and many master anglers achieved miraculous catches with such rods. Today's fishermen also believe that such fishing rods with long histories will bring them good luck.

name: Wavepiercer
description:
A slender fishing rod with a beautiful metallic glamor. Made of innovative metal materials designed by the Fontaine Research Institute, it combines light weight and resistance. Thanks to the solid metal loops reinforcing the connections between each section, the rod is capable of bearing fish of astonishing weight. Moreover, the reel seat is modeled after the handguards on weapon handles, protecting the angler from being damaged by fierce and "tough" fish. 
According to experienced fishers, this rod is the perfect weapon against "Iron Fish," the specialty of Fontaine, and is comparable to a trusty lance.

name: Genshin Impact: A New World
description:
Namecard style.
"Welcome to Teyvat!"

name: Travel Notes: Catch the Wind
description:
Namecard style.
The most difficult part of writing a travel journal is coming up with the beginning.
special_description: "Travel Notes: Catch the Wind" namecard style.

name: Amber: Bunny
description:
Namecard style.
"It's Baron Bunny!"

name: Klee: Explosive
description:
Namecard style.
Klee's lucky explosive — can you tell if it's Jumpy Dumpty or Dodoco? (Hint: Look carefully at the tail...)

name: Diluc: Flames
description:
Namecard style.
Master Crepus painted many eagles during his lifetime, but he never could've foreseen creating an eagle with such fire.

name: Razor: Wolvensprint
description:
Namecard style.
It's quite a sight to behold Razor and the wolves prepare their dinner, but they won't let Klee or the Traveler see the slightly gruesome affair.

name: Venti: Azure Sky
description:
Namecard style.
The bright blue of a cloudless sky and the melodious tone of Der Frühling complement each other perfectly.

name: Jean: The Winds' Course
description:
Namecard style.
The dandelion, also called "lion's fang" by some, is the flower most sensitive to the direction of the wind.

name: Barbara: Flow
description:
Namecard style.
When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.

name: Kaeya: Pavo Ocellus
description:
Namecard style.
The pattern of peacock feathers resembles eyes that never shut. Can we really say that this Pavo Ocellus is missing an eye...?

name: Lisa: Tempus Fugit
description:
Namecard style.
An hourglass marks the end of the work day for Lisa. Its sand moves fast.

name: Sucrose: Bio-Alchemy
description:
Namecard style.
If you closely examine an Anemo Hypostasis before it disappears, you will discover that they are actually quite square.

name: Fischl: Night Raven
description:
Namecard style.
A raven dark as midnight with wings that can block out the sun. "I permit thee to conceive his likeness upon such decoration!"

name: Noelle: Protector
description:
Namecard style.
Noelle is quite special. Noelle won't let any harm come to you.

name: Mona: Starry Sky
description:
Namecard style.
A girl gazes down at the stars' reflection on the water, pondering the joys and sorrows of life.

name: Bennett: Recognition
description:
Namecard style.
A sign of recognition from Benny's Adventure Team.

name: Xiangling: Fresh from the Pan
description:
Namecard style.
Try saying this three times fast: "Guoba sears sea snails by Liyue's sea shore."

name: Xingqiu: Rainbow
description:
Namecard style.
Come watch the night rain that brings no rainbow.

name: Qiqi: Cold Storage
description:
Namecard style.
What should be kept in the fridge? Dr. Baizhu's herbs, coconut milk... and Hu Tao.

name: Keqing: Lightning Stiletto
description:
Namecard style.
It was originally invented to just test out one's surroundings and climb to high places, really...

name: Achievement: Explorer
description:
Namecard style.
After all your wanderings throughout the world, do not forget the reason why you first set out.

name: Achievement: Virtuoso
description:
Namecard style.
After mastering these skills, you may just find that you can get by just fine without engaging in battle. If you are without any commission to complete, that is.

name: Achievement: Hero
description:
Namecard style.
Your hero's journey began before you knew it, but it's the experiences that really made it special.

name: Mondstadt: Whistling Wind
description:
Namecard style.
Listen to the singing of Mondstadt's birds and winds.

name: Liyue: Stillness of Stone
description:
Namecard style.
Witness the lonely, cloud-covered peaks of Liyue.

name: Achievement: Colors of the Rainbow
description:
Namecard style.
Light can refract into countless colors, but people stop at seven because they're lazy to count. Perhaps the elements are like that, too.

name: Achievement: Bowmaster
description:
Namecard style.
Draw that bowstring taut!

name: Achievement: Challenger
description:
Namecard style.
Even if you're just going out to get a single dandelion, there will be obstacles in your path. But you love a challenge, don't you?

name: Achievement: Deep & Dark
description:
Namecard style.
The deeper you delve, the more secrets you shall uncover.

name: Achievement: Hill Dwellers
description:
Namecard style.
The hilichurls were dubbed the "hill devils." But a certain young girl named Musk insists on calling them the "hill dwellers."

name: Achievement: Snowy Land
description:
Namecard style.
You've heard many stories about Snezhnaya. What does it look like in your mind's eye?

name: Achievement: Cliffhanger
description:
Namecard style.
They say that storytellers love their cliffhangers — but you? You've heard it all before.

name: Achievement: Reunion
description:
Namecard style.
We shall meet again someday.

name: Ningguang: Phoenix
description:
Namecard style.
They say that "more's the pity that phoenixes are few." But seriously, one Ningguang is more than enough...

name: Beidou: Weighing Anchor
description:
Namecard style.
"Weighing anchor out to sea, one is wont to waver. But look to the skies, and the stars shall light the way."

name: Chongyun: Spirit Blade
description:
Namecard style.
This was originally a peachwood sword made of ice. But a big enough ice block makes a better exorcist's tool than peachwood.

name: Achievement: Challenger II
description:
Namecard style.
That which awaits at the end of the challenges is...

name: Travel Notes: Fading Star
description:
Namecard style.
So long as there is still desire left in your heart, when you hold your head high you will see that which glitters but is not light.
special_description: "Travel Notes: A New Star" namecard style.

name: Diona: Meow!
description:
Namecard style.
All who have Kätzlein blood will have such feline features. An ancient prank played by a certain someone, perhaps?

name: Zhongli: Planet Befall
description:
Namecard style.
Stars fall, light dims.

name: Xinyan: Song's End
description:
Namecard style.
Xinyan only has time to examine her instrument carefully after the performance is over. Even in silence, it is a beauty.

name: Childe: Foul Legacy
description:
Namecard style.
This bears all the marks of that fellow who gallivants as he pleases across the continent with his ever-changing combat styles. Yet, his "Foul Legacy" was not originally his. Rather, it was taught to him by that solitary girl who dwelt in the darkest corners of the universe.

name: Mondstadt: Hero's Fame
description:
Namecard style.
The name of the Honorary Knight has spread far and wide among the citizenry.

name: Mondstadt: Blessing
description:
Namecard style.
They who have it in their hearts to bless others shall themselves be blessed.

name: Liyue: A Thousand Ships
description:
Namecard style.
Many boats have been numbered by day and night.

name: Liyue: In the Clouds
description:
Namecard style.
The peaks adorn the clouded moon.

name: Achievement: Challenger III
description:
Namecard style.
Finally, a worthy opponent! Our battle will be legendary!

name: Achievement: Snowy Summit
description:
Namecard style.
A draconian peak must be scaled.

name: Ganyu: Qilin
description:
Namecard style.
Do no harm to plant nor insect.

name: Albedo: Sun Blossom
description:
Namecard style.
Allow me to bear witness to this miracle.

name: Travel Notes: Chalk
description:
Namecard style.
Remember to keep warm when setting foot on the mountain.

name: Frostbearing: Ancient Tree
description:
Namecard style.
We shall rise again — the tree of old has sprouted anew.

name: Celebration: Hypostasis
description:
Namecard style.
My opponent for today seems to have an artistic temperament.

name: Xiao: Mask
description:
Namecard style.
He longs for a day to come when he will wear the mask and dance — not to conquer demons, but to the tune of that flute amid a sea of flowers.

name: Hu Tao: Spirit Soother
description:
Namecard style.
Director Hu Tao isn't scary at all. Probably.

name: Travel Notes: Mingxiao
description:
Namecard style.
When everyone's wishes are gathered together, they can light up the long night.

name: Celebration: Lantern-Light
description:
Namecard style.
Every year on this day, the lanterns light up the night. May the fire never die, and may humanity endure.

name: Celebration: Mechanicus
description:
Namecard style.
You claim to have seen all mechanisms, but have you ever considered playing yourself as a pawn?

name: Rosaria: Indenture
description:
Namecard style.
The unselfish warmth and goodwill of the people is, to her, a kindness that she must repay, and so it is an indenture that follows her forever.

name: Travel Notes: Windblume
description:
Namecard style.
Who has seen the wind? Neither you nor I. Nor has anyone ever seen love, till a bouquet comes flying by.

name: Celebration: Feast
description:
Namecard style.
Excellent!

name: Celebration: Shining Scale
description:
Namecard style.
The universe does play host to just such a snake, whose scales glitter with precisely these colors.

name: Celebration: Fruit of Wisdom
description:
Namecard style.
What knowledge might the fruit of wisdom bring, were it to descend upon the land? Either way, it'll taste good as a drink if left in Diona's hands.

name: Celebration: Peekaboo!
description:
Namecard style.
You can't see me. You can't see me.

name: Yanfei: Impartial
description:
Namecard style.
Justice, signed in scarlet.

name: Eula: Ice-Sealed
description:
Namecard style.
A cold heart is but a shell to protect oneself.

name: Travel Notes: Sub-Space Recreation
description:
Namecard style.
How many nights have you spent with a stone for your pillow?

name: Achievement: Tea Time
description:
Namecard style.
The days and months pass within the teapot.

name: Kaedehara Kazuha: Autumn Maple-Viewing
description:
Namecard style.
"The pine-song ripples as red leaves billow."

name: Travel Notes: Midsummer
description:
Namecard style.
It's adventure time!

name: Achievement: Vacation Home
description:
Namecard style.
The world is wide under the eaves.

name: Celebration: Vastness
description:
Namecard style.
Imagine the vast expanse of a sea of stars. Imagine a one followed by a hundred zeros.

name: Celebration: Kaboomball
description:
Namecard style.
"In a land far, far away, there was a kingdom known as the Grand Alliance, and the people living there could throw ever-changing, quick, and powerful Kaboomballs."

name: Celebration: Battlesong
description:
Namecard style.
Good omens must appear thrice for good fortune to come. One bows thrice at curtain call. The opponents to defeat number three.

name: Inazuma: Sacred Sakura
description:
Namecard style.
Wherever the sakura petals fall, there the protection of the sacred tree rests.

name: Travel Notes: Grand Narukami Shrine
description:
Namecard style.
The sakura of Mt. Yougou symbolizes the Grand Narukami Shrine.
special_description: "Travel Notes: Grand Narukami Shrine" namecard style.

name: Kamisato Ayaka: Folding Fan
description:
Namecard style.
Ayaka does constantly change out the fans she carries with her, of course. If you're buying her some as gifts, remember not to send summer fans or throwing fans. Dancing fans or tea fans are good choices, though.

name: Yoimiya: Auratus Spark
description:
Namecard style.
Even momentary sparks can leave beautiful, unquenchable flames in the hearts of those who watch the night sky.

name: Sayu: Muji-Muji Daruma
description:
Namecard style.
It is even smaller than Sayu, sure, but it can help her do the things she doesn't want to do.

name: Inazuma: Raiden Emblem
description:
Namecard style.
This is the emblem of the Ogosho Shogun, and is the banner of her troops, the Electro Mitsudomoe.

name: Inazuma: Kamisato Crest
description:
Namecard style.
This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan.

name: Achievement: Gate
description:
Namecard style.
What encounters lie on the other side of this door?

name: Achievement: Traversal
description:
Namecard style.
A traveler shall experience ten thousand tales, and each shall form a part of the traveler's soul.

name: Achievement: Stone Dragon
description:
Namecard style.
Our journey among the precipices.

name: Achievement: Full Bloom
description:
Namecard style.
Gather ye then soil from all corners of the universe, and from it may countless flowers grow.

name: Inazuma: Kujou Insignia
description:
Namecard style.
This Tri-Commission house-crest represents the Tenryou Commission's Kujou Clan.

name: Celebration: Wondrous Calculation
description:
Namecard style.
A true grandmaster can see the board a thousand steps ahead.

name: Raiden Shogun: Enlightenment
description:
Namecard style.
Not simply Ei, and not merely the Raiden Shogun. Observe yourself also with one stormy eye, and you will someday reach a breakthrough.

name: Sangonomiya Kokomi: The Deep
description:
Namecard style.
All Watatsumi islanders know this tale: that deep beneath the waves lies their former home.

name: Kujou Sara: Tengu
description:
Namecard style.
Kujou Sara may have forsaken the arrogant life of the tengu race, but she has never neglected their brilliance with the sword or their supernatural might.

name: Aloy: Dawn
description:
Namecard style.
"Everything I do is in the service of life, not death."

name: Travel Notes: Moonchaser
description:
Namecard style.
May the moonlight wash over you, O pursuer!

name: Inazuma: Sangonomiya Crest
description:
Namecard style.
This is the emblem of the Sangonomiya Clan, the leaders of Watatsumi's people.

name: Achievement: Nails
description:
Namecard style.
"Wait, if these fish can't be eaten, then why are we hammering these nails into fishhooks?" "Oh, you wouldn't understand."

name: Celebration: Tuneful Delight
description:
Namecard style.
O stars and mountains above, listen to my song!

name: Celebration: Ikki
description:
Namecard style.
"I will ask you a question, and you shall answer me with your sword."

name: Thoma: Blazing Guard
description:
Namecard style.
Blazing armor, flaming guards.

name: Travel Notes: Heavenly General
description:
Namecard style.
"You were not created to punish evil. But as to what your purpose is... I fear that I, too, do not know."

name: Inazuma: Eagleplume
description:
Namecard style.
Pirka chikappo! Kapatcir kamuy!

name: Gorou: Leisurely Hound
description:
Namecard style.
As long as you believe in the path you are walking, then everything you encounter on your journey will be a source of happiness.

name: Itto: Oni Face
description:
Namecard style.
A real man puts sorrow and anger behind him and smiles brightly for the world to see!

name: Travel Notes: Lyratum
description:
Namecard.
Only this flower remains on the heights where all trees have withered.

name: Shenhe: Comb
description:
Namecard style.
The early onset of white hair is often correlated to one's sorrows. Since "comb" and "scatter" are similarly read in Liyue's language, they believe that combing one's hair is the same as scattering one's misfortunes.

name: Yun Jin: Rhyme
description:
Namecard style.
Ms. Yun has two sorts of teachers. The critics of her onstage performances are one, and the books on rhyme she references while writing are the other.

name: Inazuma: Tokoyo
description:
Namecard style.
"O Mighty Sun! What use are your heat and light if you cannot own all that they survey?"

name: Travel Notes: Flowing Hues
description:
Namecard style.
The luxurious colors flow past — all things are renewed.

name: Celebration: Binge Vessel
description:
Namecard.
There's a great many stories here, but no alcohol, so it's safe for Paimon to drink.

name: Yae Miko: Kitsune Dreaming
description:
Namecard style.
Where can Yae Miko's fox form be found? In your dreams, that's where.

name: Travel Notes: Awakening
description:
Namecard style.
The three realms quake, heaven and earth awaken. The Sangacorexes, too, rise again from their eternal slumber.

name: Kamisato Ayato: Ripple
description:
Namecard style.
The camellia alights upon the mirrored pond, sending ripples throughout the water.

name: Lumens: Stone of Light
description:
Namecard style.
What flows within this nameless, voiceless azure crystal? The secrets of the heavens? Or the whispers of the abyss?

name: Achievement: Thunderclap
description:
Namecard style.
Listen to the sound that comes from the clouds. That is its resentful rage, and its tiny wish.

name: Achievement: Chasm
description:
Namecard style.
Where once miners industriously delved and tunneled, now all is silent. Only the Glazed Sand Crystal and marrows of stone, both millennia-old, still give off any brilliance.

name: Travel Notes: Irodori
description:
Namecard style.
Those who share a hobby are known as a group as "fans." Best come up with those stories, everyone, before the kitsune editor-in-chief dreams up copyright law... Or perhaps she has already dreamed it up, but does not altogether mind?

name: Yelan: Throw
description:
Namecard style.
"Dice are always quite hard to make 'fair.' That goes double for dice with shoddier workmanship. The weighting on each numbered side will almost certainly be unbalanced."

name: Kuki Shinobu: Net
description:
Namecard style.
"You know those Naku Weed rings they have in Inazuma? You know, the kind that can drive out evil? Shinobu got the idea that since wicked things won't cross their boundaries willingly, we could make them into items that could be actively used. Ah, her talent for being a shrine maiden truly is frightening..."

name: Travel Notes: Divine Will
description:
Namecard style.
"Once upon a time, loyal souls did scatter east and west like swan geese." "Today I light my lantern, that they may not lose their way."

name: Shikanoin Heizou: Temari
description:
Namecard style.
A Temari of entwining strings in various colors. It must have taken someone's great effort to make such an item, yet Heizou only sees it as a simple game to untangle each string.

name: Travel Notes: Azure Main
description:
Namecard style.
Years have gone by, and you wake from an old dream. Inside the keepsake shell, lingers the blue ocean of those summer days.

name: Tighnari: Dew-Kissed
description:
Namecard style.
Tighnari takes good care of his big, fluffy tail. The essential oil he uses was extracted from flowers and mixed together meticulously. It gives off a faint, calming scent.

name: Collei: Good Virtue
description:
Namecard style.
"I—It's Cuilein-Anbar! I, uh..."

name: Dori: Jinni
description:
Namecard style.
If you wipe the lamp she gave you and then scrub the Mora you gave her, no wish is unattainable... right?

name: Travel Notes: Woodlands
description:
Namecard style.
Beneath the tranquil moon and inside the deep valley grows blooming roses. 'Tis a paradise with your presence.

name: Achievement: Roaming
description:
Namecard style.
Every journey and memory is a unique miracle that only belongs to the traveler.

name: Achievement: Fated Encounter
description:
Namecard style.
One day, our encounter at this moment shall shine like a star of reminiscence in our hearts.

name: Sumeru: Shimmering Woods
description:
Namecard style.
What dreams lie within the rich slumber of the stories deep in the woods?

name: Sumeru: Observance
description:
Namecard style.
Behold everything the world has to offer; see through all that the sky's light surveys.

name: Sumeru: Unsullied
description:
Namecard style.
The wise, graced with the thorough knowledge of the truth, will not be sullied by sin. They are like the Nilotpala Lotus, which remains clear and pure even after the rains and winds have passed.

name: Travel Notes: Returning Winds
description:
Namecard style.
The years come and go. Only remembrance and the winds that return do not change.

name: Cyno: Silence
description:
Namecard style.
Whenever Cyno falls into a profound silence, he must be considering some weighty judgment... Or perhaps he is simply considering something amusing.

name: Candace: Gray Heron
description:
Namecard style.
The burning winds of the past ruffle the heron's feathers, but the bird has eyes only for the morning star at first light.

name: Nilou: Lotus Dance
description:
Namecard style.
The lotus that blooms amidst the pure water is naught but a flash of light beneath her toes.

name: Achievement: Seven Lights
description:
Namecard style.
Anyone can play a tune that belongs just to them, and like the dew upon grass, can reflect the seven lights of heaven.

name: Sumeru: Sandtreader
description:
Namecard style.
The sands subsume the tracks of travelers, and they await the day when a gust of wind will reveal gilded memories once more.

name: Achievement: Mirrored Dreams
description:
Namecard style.
"A millennium of obsession and tragic yearning has long been lost in the sandstorms of those blazing nights. But the eternal verdant oasis of her dreams is, in all likelihood, as tender as it was at the first..."

name: Nahida: Crescent
description:
Namecard style.
The rising moon admires the sun, because her light can shine all over the earth. On the other hand, the setting sun is envious of the moon, for she can be accompanied by the sweetest of dreams.

name: Layla: Daydream
description:
Namecard style.
"The starry sky in your dreams will illuminate your way forward, on the premise that the crystal in your heart reflects clear lights."

name: Travel Notes: Fungus Land
description:
Namecard style.
"Traveler, there is no need to grieve, for the wind at dawn will blow the fungal spores carrying beautiful dreams to the fields that contain your hopes..."

name: Wanderer: Drifter's Ballad
description:
Namecard style.
In a world most transient does the past hide, and in the whims of flowing flowers does thin snow abide.

name: Faruzan: Sealed Secret
description:
Namecard style.
"A—Anyway! Next time, remember to refer to me as Madam Faruzan before you ask a question! Seriously..."

name: Achievement: Invoker
description:
Namecard style.
"In this village, no one can defeat me!"

name: Travel Notes: Stellar Rivers
description:
Namecard style.
Forgotten is the name of the ancient feast, scattered are the three rivers amongst a plumage of clouds, and across the curve of twilight does autumn yet linger.

name: Alhaitham: Enlightenment
description:
Namecard style.
"The only things researchers should abide by are debates and dialectics. Only by questioning everything at all times can one avoid falling into prejudice."

name: Yaoyao: Yuegui
description:
Namecard style.
"Can you guess which one here is Yuegui? That's right, all of them are!"

name: Celebration: Lenticular Clouds
description:
Namecard style.
The floating clouds dispersed to the thousand peaks at dawn.

name: Travel Notes: Rhythm and Rhyme
description:
Namecard style.
With magnificent sunglow sheds light on the night sky, chimes are orchestrated to celebrate the bygone year. The gilded palaces are adorned with beaded curtains, the railings painted silver by bright moonlight, and the feasts brimmed with jolly singing and dances. Is that flowers or fireworks? A wealth of instruments plays in unison, harmonious and pleasant.
special_description: "Travel Notes: Rhythm and Rhyme" namecard style

name: Sumeru: Sandstorm
description:
Namecard style.
The endless sandstorm conceals ancient dreams...

name: Dehya: Purifying Flame
description:
Namecard style.
Those that should be burned will be reduced to fly ash, so that all the precious things that should be preserved can be revealed.

name: Mika: Index
description:
Namecard style.
Every time he holds the map he illustrated in his hands, the boy feels like he is holding a small piece of rubbing of this world.

name: Travel Notes: Artful Intent
description:
Namecard style.
It is said that experiencing true love is like seeing a ghost. Most folks speak of both as hearsay, but true witnesses remain few and far between. That said, since even ghosts can manifest here, perhaps true love is also waiting right around the next corner.

name: Baizhu: Relief
description:
Namecard style.
Sincerity begets longevity.

name: Kaveh: Domed Court
description:
Namecard style.
"When conceptualizing architecture, there is nothing wrong with imagining that the structure we build will surmount the firmament and outlast the stars."

name: Achievement: Infinitum
description:
Namecard style.
"Oh, Khvarena in your endless forms, protect this imperiled land. The blights and glories of the earthly realm are naught but the illusion of existing seeds."

name: Achievement: Transient Twilight
description:
Namecard style.
"I will forget the flowers of yesteryear, the daylight, the rain. I ask that you remember in my stead, in this nascent world, and hold to that lost dream."

name: Sumeru: The Great Dream
description:
Namecard style.
"The time to flourish has yet to come. Hide me with care between the blades of grass and beneath the tallness of trees. Let me linger in that place of dreams."

name: Sumeru: Amrita
description:
Namecard style.
The ancient Amrita Pool is suffused with recollections of times past. Perhaps it also contains the power that will create the future.

name: Travel Notes: Crown of Glory
description:
Namecard style.
"Knowledge serves as the crown of time, and reminiscence is bound to the time we shared as one."
special_description: "Travel Notes: Crown of Glory" namecard style.

name: Kirara: Neko Box
description:
Namecard style.
"To Kirara, the smiles on her customers' faces are the best rewards possible."

name: Travel Notes: Secrets
description:
Namecard style.
Never forget the time you once spent with games and good friends. Never forget what it feels like to have no worries about the future.

name: Travel Notes: Vivid Illumination
description:
Namecard style
Who knows? Perhaps the phantasmal light that only exists on the other side of this transparent glass can ever so slightly brighten up the world on this one.

name: Lyney: Pretense
description:
Namecard style.
One major type of magic revolves around making things "vanish." Lyney has an arsenal of tricks up his sleeve. As his accomplice, as long as you are willing to turn a blind eye, all your problems may vanish as well.

name: Lynette: Earnestness
description:
Namecard style.
One major type of magic revolves around "appearing suddenly." Lynette is usually conserving her energy, but her serious side can "appear" as abruptly as pigeons from a hat.

name: Freminet: Progress
description:
Namecard style.
As the clockwork devices do naught but round and round in circles turn, the dolls march forward.

name: Fontaine: Judgment
description:
Namecard style.
The insignia of the new Hydro Archon. Even without any legal notice, it is understood that none dare use it without permission.

name: Achievement: Orbits
description:
Namecard style.
"O Almighty Sovereign, the Universitas Magistrorum has provided the predictions you requested: The two stars have been captured by the world's gravity... After a lengthy orbital period, today their paths shall intertwine once more."

name: Achievement: Mariner
description:
Namecard style.
The hands of travelers have touched ten thousand streams. They all flow from the same font of the world's waters, and all return to the same sea.

name: Fontaine: Wondrous Machine
description:
Namecard style.
The symbol of the energy blocks used by all of Fontaine's clockwork meka. There was once a great debate over whether it should be registered as a trademark, but in the end, the public was simply called upon not to use it too freely.

name: Fontaine: Big News
description:
Namecard style.
The trademarked logo of The Steambird. If you are discovered using it without first obtaining prior permission, we will uphold our rights and prosecute the offense to the fullest extent of the law!

name: Travel Notes: Primordial Waters
description:
Namecard style.
Timepieces accompany the tranquil passing of the years, as fish accompany the swirling of the clear waters of the font. If all that is must one day wither, why are my thoughts as clear as ever?

name: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
description:
A stone that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby Anemoculi.
This man-made stone plate possesses a certain characteristic similar to that of the Anemo Statues of The Seven, giving it the power to resonate with Anemoculi.
Oculus Resonance Stones are crude imitations of the Statues of The Seven constructed by the ancients. But it is precisely this crudeness that makes them crave the power of elemental oculi, thus providing devout worshippers and adventurers alike a prime opportunity to collect oculi.

name: Geoculus Resonance Stone
description:
A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.
This exquisite stone plate imitates a certain mysterious quality of the Geo Statues of The Seven, causing it to lead people to the location of Geoculi.
Elemental Oculi represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven — perhaps offering this power back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.

name: Geo Treasure Compass
description:
A compass that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby chests.
The land of Geo is rich with valuable resources, with treasures hidden throughout the mountains and wilderness just waiting to be found.

name: Wind Catcher
description:
A bottle that is able to hold Anemograna and use their energy to generate wind currents.
This item was designed by Knights of Favonius scholars to help the Knights on their scouting expeditions and travels by affording them the ability to better use the blessings of the Anemo God.
In order to take advantage of its wind currents with a wind glider, however, you technically need a gliding license — this has prevented it from becoming widely used, at least legally anyway.

name: Portable Waypoint
description:
Use this to create a temporary Teleport Waypoint at your current location. Only one can exist at a time.
A pocket-sized item that creates a temporary Teleport Waypoint. It is capable of connecting with the ley lines, at least to the extent necessary to bring about teleportation.
Although it offers an incredible convenience to Vision bearers, the actual principles behind Teleport Waypoints are not yet fully understood. We can only hope that using them does not cause any undesirable side effects...

name: Adepti Seeker's Stove
description:
A portable stove that can be quickly set up for cooking in the environment. If you enter into combat nearby, it will be destroyed.
Liyue's terrain is vast, varied, and at times even inhospitable — and yet all its inhabitants share a love of good food. These two phenomena would not be able to coexist were it not for portable cooking equipment like this. Whether you are scaling the heights of Jueyun Karst or exploring the islets of Guyun Stone Forest, bringing a portable stove means that a delicious and freshly cooked hot meal is always available at a moment's notice.

name: Condensed Resin
description:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

name: NRE (Menu 30)
description: A handy meal-in-a-pouch that can transform most foods into instantly absorbable nutritional matter. Despite the fact that it can greatly increase the efficiency of nutritional intake, most knights aren't too keen to put their food in it...

name: Anemo Treasure Compass
description:
A compass that can be used in Mondstadt to search for nearby chests.
The needle of the Treasure Compass doesn't spin according to the world's magnetic field, but rather follows the energy of ley lines to lead the user to treasure.

name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
description:
A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

name: Mini Seelie: Dayflower
description:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature sea-blue Seelie. Unlike other Seelie, it does not serve to guide others, but to follow them to see the world.

name: Mini Seelie: Rosé
description:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature powder-pink Seelie. Though it cannot say a word, it will silently follow a traveler that strikes its fancy around the world.

name: Mini Seelie: Curcuma
description:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature golden Seelie. It gives off a feeling very similar to that of Mora. They say that Seelie of this color represent good fortune.

name: Warming Bottle
description:
Upon use, emits heat for a short period over a small area, diminishing the effect of Sheer Cold.
Warming Seelie have evolved in response to the extreme change in temperature to give the comfort of warmth to those who seek it. This convenient gadget was originally crafted by those who struggled to survive in the snowy mountains in imitation of such evolved Seelie.

name: Kamera
description:
A convenient tool that records and saves images upon use.
A special item from Fontaine that can record images. People and places to remember must come aplenty for a Traveler roaming the world.

name: Kurious Kamera
description:
Use this during the "Five Flushes of Fortune" event to store images of objects with a specific color.
Ji Tong imported this new-fangled Kamera model from Fontaine, but it doesn't seem to work quite as he'd hoped...

name: Special Kamera
description:
When used, this useful gadget can save and store the scenery before it and add a special color tone to it.
A strange device from Fontaine that will not only record sceneries but will also add special colors to the printed images. This design was made in response to "The Steambird"'s request for a Kamera that could not only reflect the environment, but also the emotions of the one taking the picture. Unfortunately, the final product could not quite match their specifications.

name: Parametric Transformer
description:
A device that can transmute materials placed within and convert it into some other material.
·During the transmutation process, you must use <color=#3399CCFF>Elemental Attacks</color> to generate enough energy for the transmutation to take place.
·After obtaining the transmuted materials, you must wait seven days to use it once again.

This mysterious device, discovered within the ruins, has the power to accelerate cycles and "transmute" material objects. Generally speaking, everything is undergoing a cycle. Memories and elements surge within the ley lines, rotten fallen fruits return to the soil, and the trees born from the soil will one day bear their crystalline fruit...

name: Inquisitive Endora
description:
A strange Lochfolk larva, filled with curiosity about the world at large.
Lochfolk specialize in shifting into watery shapes and can meld with other water bodies to synchronize emotions and knowledge alike. Endora is still small, and Endora is very curious. Endora can spit out bubbles to meld with other beings of water, through which she shall learn everything.

name: Endora
description: Just a very curious Lochfolk who only wishes to see the world. Might actually get along very well with Mini Seelie: Dayflower, but please do not meld them together, thank you.

name: Windblume Festival Commemorative Balloon
description:
Use this to release a balloon that can be popped.
Balloons have special significance in the land of the wind, for they represent the freedom to drift with the wind. Of course, air pressure will destroy balloons once they've reached a certain height.

name: Windsong Lyre
description:
Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs.
An instrument of incredible workmanship, it will surely produce moving music when played by able hands.
Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song, and thus also boasts a long history of constructing instruments to that effect. Bards are most proud of their songs and poems, and perhaps the instruments, too, would be proud of their owners and their musical tradition.

name: Serenitea Pot
description: A teapot obtained from Madame Ping. There seems to be a whole new realm within it...

name: Wind-Blessed Harpastum
description: A harpastum made from pure bird feathers and strong fabric. Perhaps it contains some strange power...

name: Waverider Repair Toolbox
description:
A toolbox filled with all manner of items that can be used to repair the damage done to a Waverider.
·Restores 50% of a Waverider's structural integrity.
·Has a 90s cooldown.

name: Straight Shooter
description: A Harpastum Bomb with a comfortable weight that makes it easy to control and throw accurately. It can deal a large amount of Pyro DMG to a single opponent.

name: Floaty Splody
description: A Harpastum Bomb of cunning design that sends fragments flying every which way when it explodes, dealing a certain amount of Pyro DMG over a wide AoE.

name: Hot Pod
description: A Harpastum Bomb brimming with Pyro energy. When unleashed, it will burst into violent flame, dealing a small amount of Pyro DMG over a small AoE. It is extraordinarily effective against Cryo shields.

name: Electroculus Resonance Stone
description:
A stone that can be used in Inazuma to search for nearby Electroculi.
This strange device can resonate with Electro Statues of The Seven. Due to this trait, it can detect the presence of Electroculi.
Across the span of endless years, even the most majestic cities and sculptures would be worn down by wind and rain, and even the power of Statues of The Seven would gradually dissipate. But this faded strength would coalesce once more into the Oculi, which call out wordlessly to their Statues.

name: Seed Dispensary
description:
A special container obtained from Madame Ping. According to her, this dispensary has the power to "generate seeds"... That is to say, it can create the seeds of various plants according to their special traits, which can then be planted within the appropriate fields within your Serenitea Pot.
Plants available for planting: Silk Flower, Sweet Flower, Cecilia, Glaze Lily, Windwheel Aster, Qingxin, Violetgrass, Valberry, Small Lamp Grass, Jueyun Chili, Carrot, Radish, Mint, Mushroom, Naku Weed, Horsetail, Snapdragon, Lotus Head, Calla Lily, Seagrass, Sea Ganoderma, Harra Fruit, Zaytun Peach, Sumeru Rose, Pluie Lotus, Marcotte, Lumidouce Bell, Rainbow Rose.

name: Electro Treasure Compass
description:
A handy tool used to locate nearby chests in Inazuma.
The land of the thundering archipelago has suffered a great many past hurts. The many treasure chests that dot the islands are a symbol of its revival from these wounds.

name: Red Feather Fan
description:
Use this to increase Gliding Movement SPD by 30% for 30s.

This item possesses some sort of mysterious power. In the hands of the tengu warriors, it can have various effects, but in the hands of an ordinary person, it can still have enough power to "make one's body lighter" while in mid-air.

name: Memento Lens
description:
A mysterious lens. If you view small fox statues with this lens, you can find things that were not there before.
They say that in the distant past, the legendary Kitsune Saiguu left a catalyst for the then-Hiiragi Clan head, Hiroshi, as a tool to be used in exorcisms.
The Hiiragis would have a special Kamera made to order from overseas with that catalyst mounted on its lens assembly, before giving it back to the Grand Narukami Shrine as a symbol of their friendship.

name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
description:
A small and special Seelie, particularly sensitive to the presence of Iron Coins.
A companion entrusted to you by Ulman. Seelie are naturally inclined to guide people, though this Seelie seems weaker than usual, and possesses a remarkable obsession with Iron Coins...

name: Mini Seelie: Viola
description:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature purple Seelie. Its color is very similar to that of Electro-infused items. Who knows if you might get a little tingle from poking it...

name: Peculiar Pinion
description:
A strange feather.
It may be able to trigger some wondrous effects if used on Tsurumi Island.
Take this feather with you into the world.

You did promise him that you would, after all.

name: Peculiar Pinion
description:
After defeating the monster that made the apex of Amakumo Peak its home, you discovered this strange feather.
It fell from the Thunderbird that once inhabited Tsurumi Island, and is the original form of the Maushiro.
It may have some special properties on Tsurumi Island.

name: Ayesha's Chaos Prospector
description: A handy tool that the researcher Ayesha created on the side while researching ancient relics. It can be used to detect such ancient relics buried underground. Due to its hasty production, however, its accuracy could stand to be improved. Users should beware that some unexpected things may occur while using this gadget...

name: Omni-Ubiquity Net
description: A net that has been modified once again by Wakamurasaki using onmyoudou. She claims that it can detain the essence of small creatures before using the net itself as a medium to recreate their forms.

name: Floral Zither
description:
A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
It is made of rather unique materials, and its craftsmanship is quite different from the designs that are currently in vogue. An unpredictable strength has been woven into the ethereal strings that can even allow it to cause the illusions within the heart of its player to surface.
There is an old adage in Liyue: "the longer one's eye of the flower drinks, the deeper one's heart into the mire sinks." It seems that only the strong-willed may use this instrument.

name: Shiki Koshou
description: A gift from Shiki Taishou: a replica armed with spiritual power. Though Shiki Koshou is incapable of charm magic, it is in contact with Shiki Taishou at all times and can share all that it has seen and heard with him, so it's almost like you've still got Shiki Taishou with you on your journey.

name: Ubiquity Net
description: A friend of Sango's used Kamuna Onmyoudou in a fit of inspiration to create this convenient little gadget. It is not powerful enough to capture criminals, but with a little aim, capturing little animals should be a cinch.

name: Launch Tube
description: A special device created by the artisan Pengyi. It comes with functions that allow for the creation and automated launch of fireworks. In the hands of someone creative, it will surely see great use in the creation of unique and radiant fireworks shows.

name: Lumenstone Adjuvant
description:
When equipped in The Chasm's Underground Mines, this precious crystal can provide illumination.

It has many similarities to the Glazed Sand Crystal that may only be found within The Chasm, but it stores even greater power within it.
May it be as a sun in your palm, lighting the way through the lightless tunnels and bringing comfort where all is dark.

name: Bokuso Box
description:
Use this to clear a certain area in Enkanomiya of the darkness' influence.
The name "Bokuso" is formed from "boku," meaning "to draw near to what is good," and "so," meaning "to shun that which is tainted."

name: Arataki's Great and Glorious Drum
description:
A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
A small drum that Itto gave you. He bought it from an outlander merchant, and while it does look quite normal, it is said to be a relic left behind by an ancient and powerful onmyouji who used it to drive out calamity and pray for blessings.
It would cost an ordinary person a large sum if they were to wish to possess this, but the price may be negotiated if one has some connection to the drum.
And wouldn't you know it? An 8,000,000 Mora treasure was eventually purchased for 80,000. What a steal for Itto, eh?

name: Material Collector
description: A collection device created by Bertrand, a manufacturer of machines. It can sequentially collect materials required for creating other products. When hooked up to the Great Machine, it will pour the source materials into the latter and start the process of creating robotic furnishings.

name: "Kusava"
description:
Equip it to utilize the power of Aranara.
"Fatty fruit, bitter fruit."
A temporary home for Aranara memories. Kusava makes Aranara strong.

name: Aranyaka
description:
Arama handed this book over to you.
It seems to have witnessed the passage of many years. By the look of things, someone used to keep records in it, but none of that can be retrieved now.
Use it to document your shared adventure with Arama.

name: Casket of Tomes
description:
A box for cards released by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Only beginners who have learned the basic rules and are verified as players can collect one.
They say that these boxes were made by researchers from the Sumeru Akademiya, and that they feature a special mechanism that can be used to detect nearby people who also possess Caskets of Tomes.
Use this function to engage in more matches against nearby players!

name: Dendroculus Resonance Stone
description:
A stone that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby Dendroculi.
A curious amulet of a similar nature to the Dendro Statues of The Seven. By the same token, it is drawn to Dendroculi.
In the world, there are grass and trees, vines and flowers — living beings of Dendro Element that abound in diverse shapes and forms. Though differing in appearance and various other aspects, they were born from the same land and will return to the same land.

name: Dendro Treasure Compass
description:
A compass that can be used in Sumeru to search for nearby chests.
For some people, the significance of life lies in exploration and discovery. Upon reaching each destination, there is always bountiful treasure awaiting.

name: "The Boon of the Elder Tree"
description:
A talisman that can help collect wood.
Talismans of this kind are often seen in the forests in Sumeru. They possess the ability to gather the power of grass and trees.
To prevent the erosion of the forest and, in darker times, to resist the invasion of vicious monsters, trees and vines would form impregnable shelters together. Those who held "the Boon of the Elder Tree" were recognized by the forest as its friends and thus gained unfettered access to walk amidst the forest under the guidance of streams and moonlight. But that is archaic lore from a long, long time ago.

name: Ultra-Hot Burner Lamp Test Model
description:
A gadget that improves the efficiency of food processing by consuming minerals.
Young Akademiya researchers are accustomed to cooking with their experimental instruments. Someone invented an "Ultra-Hot Burner Lamp" that utilizes the energy of minerals to juice up the heat, all the better to save time and increase cooking efficiency.
The one you have is a test model for civilian use with power constraints and a dimmer flame, which should reduce its fire hazard rating. Even so, this convenient gadget is still perfectly capable of cooking jam and drying sausages with ease.

name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
description: The "Treasure-Seeking Seelie" you got from Ulman. It doesn't look that energetic...

name: Mini Seelie: Moss
description:
A memento from the Lost Riches event. Equip it to obtain a mini Seelie companion.
A miniature green Seelie. It becomes most happy indeed when it gets close to a tree.

name: Exquisite Kamera
description:
A Kamera that Razi borrowed from Lord Sangemah Bay. It will come in handy when you take photos of beautiful scenery, look for inspiration in the wilderness, or wish to keep festive memories!
This Kamera is adorned with metal decorations and thus looks a lot more expensive than regular Kameras. Be careful with it!
According to the leasing agreement, it can only be used within Sumeru's borders.

name: Banu's Wisdom
description:
In some cosmological settings, this is a staff filled with mystical power. It can resonate with the Future Stars and show the way to them.
Of course, in some other settings, it might be an object kept in storage by an organization known as the Akademiya, and perhaps its recorded name might even be Ayesha's Chaos Prospector. There is a thin layer of dust over this object due to a long period of disuse.

name: Fishing Line Stabilizer
description:
A self-adaptive tension stabilizer that can be installed on a fishing rod to facilitate fishing. The device can automatically detect and record how hard different fish struggle. The more data it collects, the better the stabilizer works.

The device's prototype was the pointless invention of a Fontaine inventor that drew little interest for the longest time until the Fontaine Fishing Association discovered it and modified the product into the fishing line stabilizer used today. When the device first came out, it was most warmly received by the Association members, and now it has gradually been promoted in other regions.
It is an exceptionally hot commodity in the Snezhnayan market. Word has it that one of the Lord Harbingers is particularly fond of the product, which explains the hype.

name: Vintage Lyre
description:
Use this traditional instrument from Mondstadt to play songs. It may work wonders when played in the forests of Sumeru.
A vintage lyre borrowed from Amadhiah in Vimara Village.
Mondstadt has a long-standing tradition of poetry and song. Bards from there tend to address their instruments as "Friend" or "Partner." Thus, one of them trusting Amadhiah with the instrument was nothing less than a gesture of intimacy and trust.

name: Jumpy Dumpty Party Popper
description:
A party popper that, when used, unleashes streamers and confetti.
"Jumpy Dumpty is Klee's good friend and fish blasting companion! But if Klee brings Jumpy Dumpty to the festival, Master Jean will be angry... Don't you worry, though! Jumpy Dumpty has gained a new ability with Albedo's help! Just pull on its tail, and beautiful colored strips will come flying out!"

name: Scarlet Sand Slate
description: This object has long been the subject of Akademiya Researcher Tirzad's research. Its etchings and craftsmanship indicate that it is a relic of King Deshret's civilization. It seems to have the power to command devices within ruins associated with King Deshret...

name: "Bubbly Kamera"
description:
When used, this useful gadget can save and store the scenery before it and add a special color tone to it.
A strange device of unknown origin. The photos it takes have a peculiar effect. Who would've thought that a machine with no water inside could produce photos with jovial bubbles in them that lend them a sense of fantasy?
A certain Cavalry Captain once described this machine as being able to "capture people's desire for cool and refreshing days."

name: "Kusava"
description:
Equip it to utilize the power of Aranara.
"Fatty fruit, bitter fruit."
A temporary home for Aranara memories. Kusava makes Aranara strong.
Now inside it are stored the cherished memories of Aranakin, Aragaru, and Aranaga. The power within is ready to be unleashed at any minute for the sake of beloved friends.

name: Jinni in the Magic Bottle — Liloupar
description:
Born from water lilies, Liloupar, the great Jinni, whose soul had been shattered due to an ancient punishment, was sealed in a transparent magic bottle.
Now, it seems that she has found a new master...

Although she only possesses a-hundred-millionth of her previous great power, she will use what is left of her to help her master pass through the hot sand and ancient ruins of the Desert of Hadramaveth.

name: Wisdom Orb
description: A crucial item provided by the organizer of the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. Use it to capture, accommodate, and command intelligent Fungi. Word has it that it was invented by a researcher named Kautilya. Only those who can wield this item skillfully are qualified to participate in the Nilotpala Cup Beast Tamers Tournament. That said, you cannot help but feel that some of this item's functions create a strong sense of déjà vu...

name: Cloud Retainer's Damasked Device
description:
Made from stacked paper, this lightweight device has the appearance of a bird, and fittingly, was given to you by Cloud Retainer.
While it may be called a "device," you cannot see any traditional mechanical components here — well, not from the outside, anyway.
It seems that this adeptus' skills as a mechanist have improved even further...

name: Wilderness Compass
description: A special compass obtained from the Adventurers' Guild. According to certain rumors, it might just offer you a sprinkle of extra luck...

name: Sorush
description:
As one of the Pari, the defenders of the land, Sorush aspires to become a Bloomguard who shall quell calamity.
Having formed a connection with one whom she trusts, Sorush now traverses the defiled land alongside her Yasnapati...

name: Windblume Kamera
description: The Kamera you borrowed from Fassben. Be careful when using it. You don't want to break it, now...

name: Festive Drum
description:
A musical instrument that can be used in performances.
A drum with a clear sound and unique design. It has an exquisite exterior and features intricate craftsmanship. High-quality materials have been used in its construction, with a view toward sound quality during performances, intonation and long-term wear and tear.
It is said that this small drum combines an Inazuman traditional instrument with some quirks of drums from other nations. When it plays certain tunes, it can even bring people good luck...

name: Sorush
description:
A Pari born in the Vourukasha Oasis, Sorush is a Bloomguard acknowledged by the Khvarena.
Having formed a connection with one whom she trusts, Sorush now traverses the land blessed by Khvarena alongside her Yasnapati...

name: Search Compass
description: A "Search Compass" made to find relic replicas. As this device was adapted from one used to survey elemental energies, the localized elements present might disrupt its attempts to scan for those replicas...

name: Flowing Joyspar
description:
A marvelous crystal with spots of radiance that seems to be able to sense joyous emotions in a certain radius around it and lead people in the corresponding direction.
Use this to find Joyeux Vouchers in a set AoE.

name: Felicitous Joyspar
description:
A marvelous crystal within which radiance flows like a river. It seems to be able to sense joyous emotions in a vast area and lead people in the corresponding direction.
Use this to find all Joyeux Vouchers within the Veluriyam Mirage.

name: Inscribed Mirror
description: A mirror-type gadget made by the Amurta researcher Lamiya. It can be linked to the animals' devices, which will reflect the animals' points of view in the mirror.

name: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
description:
A talisman that can be used in Fontaine to search for nearby Hydroculi.
A curious talisman that possesses similar properties to the Hydro Statues of The Seven. It seems to be able to detect the Elemental Flow of Hydroculi.
Oculi are by nature scattered pieces of power belonging to the Statues of The Seven. Returning them to the Statues is therefore the reasonable, right, and lawful thing to do.

name: Hydro Treasure Compass
description:
A compass that can be used in Fontaine to search for nearby chests.
These chests scattered across Fontaine are not the lawful property of any individual or organization. In most circumstances, it is legal to claim the contents found within.

name: Crystalfly Trap
description:
A Crystalfly Trap, developed by a senior researcher named Fawitzki from Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering.
After being properly deployed and inserting the required materials, this device will start working and lure Crystalflies inside.
Fawitzki once led research on "Low-Temperature Lighting Devices," which required a large amount of Crystal Cores as research materials, which led to the development of the Crystalfly Trap.
However, the project was suspended for various reasons.
"We are here to commemorate the diligent Mr. Fawitzki. We sincerely hope that there are those who will carry on his research. The Institute will provide maximum support in any areas deemed appropriate."

name: Wind-Powered Wind Generator
description:
A wind generating device developed by Refait, senior researcher from Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering.
After being activated, this device can provide a strong lifting force for the Wind Glider user.
However, due to design limitations, the device requires utilizing significant wind power to activate. The wind energy required is approximately equal to that produced by the working Wind Glider.
"Umm... So you mean I can only activate this device when I'm already using the Wind Glider."
"But the only reason I even want to activate it is to give my Wind Glider a push!"

name: Bresson's Special Kamera
description: A Kamera specially modified by Bresson. It was manufactured with the best materials available, and has excellent performance.

name: Instructions: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Anemoculi.

name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Geoculi.

name: Diagram: Geo Treasure Compass
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Geo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Liyue.

name: Diagram: Wind Catcher
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Wind Catcher. A Wind Catcher can absorb the energy of Anemograna and release it when needed to create a wind current.

name: Instructions: Portable Waypoint
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Portable Waypoint. With a Portable Waypoint, you can create a teleport waypoint wherever in the world you want.

name: Diagram: Adepti Seeker's Stove
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Adepti Seeker's Stove. Learn it and you can create a portable stove to bring with you on your travels.

name: Instructions: Condensed Resin
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making Condensed Resin. Using resin in this condensed form to activate certain Ley Line Blossoms and Petrified Trees will increase your efficiency. You can hold no more than 5 Condensed Resin at a time.

name: Diagram: NRE (Menu 30)
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Nutrition, Ready-to-Eat (NRE) meal-in-a-pouch. Learn it and you can create a tool that makes ingesting food much quicker.

name: Diagram: Anemo Treasure Compass
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Anemo Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Mondstadt.

name: Diagram: Warming Bottle
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Warming Bottle. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to resist Sheer Cold.

name: Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.

name: Diagram: Electro Treasure Compass
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making an Electro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Inazuma.

name: Formula: Fruit Paste Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fruit Paste Bait.

name: Formula: Redrot Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Redrot Bait.

name: Formula: False Worm Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making False Worm Bait.

name: Formula: Fake Fly Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fake Fly Bait.

name: Formula: Sugardew Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Sugardew Bait.

name: Formula: Sour Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Sour Bait.

name: Formula: Flashing Maintenance Mek Bait
description: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Flashing Maintenance Mek Bait.

name: Instructions: Dendroculus Resonance Stone
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Dendroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Dendroculi.

name: Diagram: Dendro Treasure Compass
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dendro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Sumeru.

name: Instructions: Hydroculus Resonance Stone
description: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Hydroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Hydroculi.

name: Diagram: Hydro Treasure Compass
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hydro Treasure Compass. Use it to easily locate treasure all over Fontaine.

name: Memory of the Entombed City
description: Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Snow-Tombed Starsilver (Claymore).

name: Memory of the Frostbearing Tree
description: Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Frostbearer (Catalyst).

name: Diagram: Dragonspine Spear
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Dragonspine Spear (Polearm).

name: Saimon Heirloom Blade Diagram
description: The Saimon Clan possessed this diagram of how to make the Amenoma Kageuchi (Sword). You can use it to master the art of making this weapon.

name: Diagram: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
description: Someone from Tatarasuna left this diagram of Katsuragikiri Nagamasa behind. You can use it to master the art of making this Claymore.

name: Diagram: Kitain Cross Spear
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Kitain Cross Spear (Polearm).

name: Diagram: Hamayumi
description: A detailed step-by-step diagram for making a Hamayumi.

name: Mask of Memories
description:
Hanachirusato the shrine maiden used to wear this mask. It is deeply stained on the inside.
Some memories are contained inside, through which one may learn the art of creating the Catalyst known as "Hakushin Ring."
Now that Hanachirusato has been separated from this mask, Paimon doesn't get to call her the "Masked Maiden" anymore, right?

name: Tale of the Forest King
description:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the claymore "Forest Regalia."

This tale is about the Forest King.
"The forest used to be a giant maze many, many moons ago..."

name: Tale of the Desert
description:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the sword "Sapwood Blade."

This tale is about a friend lost in the desert.
"This is a story from Valuka..."

name: Tale of the King's Squire
description:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the bow "King's Squire."

This tale is about a girl lost in the forest maze.
"Once upon a time, there was a princess..."

name: Tale of the Moonlight
description:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the polearm "Moonpiercer."

This tale is about moonlight and magic.
"This story is about all the children who are fascinated by the moonlight..."

name: Tale of the Portent
description:
Through this tale, you can master the method to make the catalyst "Fruit of Fulfillment."

This tale is about portents and disasters.
"In truth, the moon did not always look like a pearl..."

name: Diagram: Finale of the Deep
description: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Finale of the Deep (Sword).

name: Diagram: Song of Stillness
description: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Song of Stillness (Bow).

name: Diagram: Tidal Shadow
description: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Tidal Shadow (Claymore).

name: Diagram: Flowing Purity
description: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Flowing Purity (Catalyst).

name: Diagram: Rightful Reward
description: A blueprint drawn by Estelle based on ancient legends and records. Learn it and you can restore Rightful Reward (Polearm).

name: Silken Print
description:
A prayer plaque that displays lovely Inazuman scenery, carved upon exquisite Yumemiru Wood in full color.
You can use Sub-Space Creation to imprint this elegant scene upon your Serenitea Pot...

name: Nature's True Fruit
description:
This fruit, brought as a memento from Sumeru by the Teapot Traveling Salesman Chubby, gives off a truly marvelous fragrance.
Even a whiff of this fruit brings certain images to mind, which you can manipulate via the power of Sub-Space Creation to recreate the wondrous sights of Sumeru in your Realm Within...

name: The Mountain Clouds Let Down Golden Rain
description: A classic "cloud blue" firework that will display its inner-and-outer-segmented design after exploding in mid-air like a profusely-blooming flower.

name: The Silver Night is Full of Stars
description: A classic "starry-night"-colored firework. Sure to be an magnificent, unforgettable sight.

name: The Gloom Paints the Cold Blooms
description: A classic firework the color of the azure skies just after rain. Its flaming flower glows when released, displaying unique petal morphologies.

name: Fireworks Dance Amidst a Snowy Sky
description: These gorgeous golden fireworks follow a particularly graceful trajectory after they ascend and are quite silent, though no less lovely for it.

name: Golden Calendula Swirl
description: These calendula-colored classics will spin like windmills after being released and are most beauteous indeed.

name: Kindled Trees by the Moonlit Window
description: After being released, these fireworks rain down flames like willow leaves and branches. It is said that the very edges of these flames can touch the window frames of the tallest buildings, granting a most unique viewing experience.

name: Mischievous Villosas
description: An Anemo Slime-shaped creation. However, its creator considered calling it an "Anemo Slime-something" just a little odd, thus using the name of a similarly-colored local snack, "Villosa Balls," instead.

name: Sparkly Shiny Dodoco!
description: After visiting a neighboring state, a certain firework artisan from Liyue met a friendly and hospitable Spark Knight, and thus created this firework based on her bestest friend, Dodoco.

name: Fame and Fortune For a Season
description: A firework that explodes in the shape of Mora. Some say that if you view this from just the right angle, your fortunes for the year shall be assured.

name: Unyielding Spirit
description: After visiting a neighboring state, a certain firework artisan from Liyue went on an unforgettable journey with a certain adventure team leader, thus basing this explosion's design off his favored gesture.

name: Festival Spotlight
description: A firework that explodes in the shape of heart. Some say that if you view this from just the right angle, your love life for the year shall be blessed.

name: Wanmin Feast
description: A firework based on the little helper for the Wanmin Restaurant's famous chef. When anyone from Liyue sees this little helper, their thoughts will immediately turn to good food. And where there's a festival, there must be good food!

name: Between the Exquisite Throws of Her Enigmatic Dice
description: A dice-shaped firework that displays a different number each time it is set off. It is said to be a gift from a firework artisan intending to show their respect for the Yanshang Teahouse's new owner. Since she took over the place, almost all the problem gamblers have disappeared. The game of cards no longer has anything to do with Mora, instead returning to its original and purest form — ordinary leisure-time amusement.

name: Inuzaka General's Friendly Helper
description: A traveling novelist was once warmly welcomed by a pointy-eared General during their stay in Watatsumi Island. The General's little canine companion left a deep impression on them, and so they commissioned an artisan to craft this firework.

name: Cliffbreaker's Banner Flutters in Drum Rolls
description: A firework meticulously designed by an opera-loving firework artisan. It explodes in the shape of the banners often seen in opera performances. Watching operas is a favorite pastime among many Liyue locals, and when fireworks with this pattern bloom in the sky, an unforgettable melody sung by a certain famed performer is sure to come to mind...

name: That Fairly Effectual "Advice" Against Wine
description: A firework commissioned by a merchant who often traveled between Liyue and Mondstadt. This firework is said to be a token of gratitude for a certain bartender, for it was after being deeply struck by her words that the merchant stopped their excessive drinking and made a great fortune.

name: Rainforest-Born Fungi
description:
A firework that explodes in the shape of a Floating Hydro Fungus.
They say that a Ministry of Civil Affairs clerk offered the inspiration for this rotund firework pattern after returning from a business trip in Sumeru, hoping that its adorable appearance would brighten everyone's heart.

name: Obliging Little Yuegui
description:
A firework inspired by a warmhearted little girl.
Many people have received a helping hand from the girl, yet none know her name — all they know is that she called her companion "Yuegui." This firework was commissioned as an expression of their gratitude and well wishes.

name: Ganyu
description: A card for the tabletop game, Genius Invokation TCG. It is built tough, and some special printing method has been used for the illustration on the card's face, resulting in a truly exquisite appearance.

name: Kaeya
description: A card for the tabletop game, Genius Invokation TCG. It is built tough, and some special printing method has been used for the illustration on the card's face, resulting in a truly exquisite appearance.

description: A card for the tabletop game, Genius Invokation TCG. It is built tough, and some special printing method has been used for the illustration on the card's face, resulting in a truly exquisite appearance.

name: Jadeplume Terrorshroom

name: Mondstadt
description: A small table used as an arena in Genius Invokation TCG matches. It normally resembles an elevated box a bit more. Some players will place their Casket of Tomes inside to better carry both around, and once opened up, the various exquisitely built arenas of differing types and styles are then revealed as stages for the duels to come.
